docs.text: Initial Setup Commands Calibrate Follower Arm lerobot-calibrate --robot.type=so101_follower --robot.port=/dev/ttyACM0 --robot.id=my_awesome_follower Calibrate follower Arm lerobot-calibrate --teleop.type=so101_leader --teleop.port=/dev/ttyACM1 --teleop.id=my_awesome_leader Teleoperate LeRobot lerobot-teleoperate --robot.type=so101_follower --robot.port=/dev/ttyACM0 --robot.id=my_awesome_follower --teleop.type=so101_leader --teleop.port=/dev/ttyACM1 --teleop.id=my_awesome_leader
docs.title: Initial Setup
